org.xbib.io.archive

Interface ArchiveCodec<S extends ArchiveSession,I extends ArchiveInputStream,O extends ArchiveOutputStream>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the archive session type
    I - the archive input stream type
    O - the archive output type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CpioArchiveCodec, EsBulkArchiveCodec, TarArchiveCodec, ZipArchiveCodec

    public interface ArchiveCodec<S extends ArchiveSession,I extends ArchiveInputStream,O extends ArchiveOutputStream>
    An archive codec defines the session and the input or output stream that are used for reading or writing to an archive.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      I createArchiveInputStream(InputStream in)
      Creates a new archive input stream
      O createArchiveOutputStream(OutputStream out)
      Creates a new archive output stream
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this archive codec ("cpio", "tar", "zip")
      S newSession(BytesProgressWatcher watcher)
      Creates a new archive session with a progress watcher

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this archive codec ("cpio", "tar", "zip")
        Returns:
        the name

        Creates a new archive session with a progress watcher
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the new archive session

      • createArchiveInputStream

        I createArchiveInputStream(InputStream in)
                    throws IOException
        Creates a new archive input stream
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream for the archive input stream
        Returns:
        the archive input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if archive input stream can not be created

                     throws IOException
        Creates a new archive output stream
        Parameters:
        out - the output stream for the archive output stream
        Returns:
        the archive output stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if archive output stream can not be created
